name: No Space To Run
description:
[This game was created as part of a short term game-jam by a small team.]

While on excursion on a distant asteroid, you and your team discover new life! Unfortunately for the rest of your team, it is a deadly infectious slime. As the last surviving crew-member of the excursion, you fight your way back to the shuttle, power up the engines, and blast away from the planet, only to make a truly horrifying discovery - you are trapped inside a small metal box with a deadly alien life-form, and you have no space to run.

No Space To Run is an action/puzzle game which requires precise timing and actions to survive through the impending dooms associated with living in space. Think you have what it takes to survive?
